changeSet.author: Shobana

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) from concept_name where name IN ("All Chemo Drugs", "All Other Drugs") and concept_name_type ="FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.comment: Create concepts for All chemo and All other drugs

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) from concept_name where name IN ("mg/m2", "AUC") and concept_name_type ="FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.author: Shobana

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) from concept_set where concept_id in (select concept_id from concept_name where name in ("mg/m2", "AUC") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND concept_set =(SELECT concept_id from concept_name where name= 'Dosing Units' AND concept_name_type="FULLY_SPECIFIED");

changeSet.comment: Add mg/m2 and AUC to dosing units

changeSet.author: Shobana

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM drug WHERE name IN ("Paclitaxel (mg/m2)", "Docetaxel (mg/m2)", "Carboplatin (AUC)", "Cisplatin (mg/m2)", "5FU (mg/m2)", "Gemcitabine (mg/m2)", "Ifosfamide (mg/m2)", "Vinorelbine (mg/m2)", "Mitomycin (mg/m2)", "Irinotecan (mg/m2)", "Filgrastim (µg)", "Pegfilgrastim (mg)");

changeSet.author: Shobana

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name in ("Paclitaxel (mg/m2)", "Docetaxel (mg/m2)", "Carboplatin (AUC)", "Cisplatin (mg/m2)", "5FU (mg/m2)", "Gemcitabine (mg/m2)", "Ifosfamide (mg/m2)", "Vinorelbine (mg/m2)", "Mitomycin (mg/m2)", "Irinotecan (mg/m2)", "Filgrastim (µg)", "Pegfilgrastim (mg)") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Chemo Drugs') and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.comment: Adding set members for "All Chemo drugs" concept

changeSet.author: Shobana
